backend/main.mo: Defines actor with shipment, invoice, client, payment, and authentication data models plus in‑memory maps and rate‑limit logic for login and OTP.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing two frontend features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing their behavior and purpose.
frontend/.env: Provides environment variable for the Google Maps API key.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind and CSS variables setup defining light/dark design tokens and base styles for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component handling landing page UI, WhatsApp quote form, shipment tracking, and conditional admin/client dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Admin client detail view showing client info with tabs for managing that client's shipments and invoices.
Form component for adding or updating a client's profile, validating inputs and submitting changes via a mutation hook.
Dialog workflow for creating and provisioning a client account, including principal validation, password generation, and mutation handling.
Displays a searchable table of client accounts with refresh and repair actions, allowing selection of a client for details.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard managing tabs for clients, tracking, revenue, history, and config, with logout and utility actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGoogl: Panel for configuring and storing a Google Geocoding API key, showing current status and setup instructions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button that exports all invoices to a downloadable CSV file using a mutation hook.
Renders an admin table for viewing, creating, updating, and deleting invoices for a specific client. Includes status helpers, form handling, dialogs, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Displays recent client login history with loading, error, empty states, and a table of entries. Fetches history via useGetLoginHistory.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: Provides UI to view, save, and verify the MSG91 API key, including storage check, alerts, and asynchronous actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Shows revenue analytics using a line chart, with loading, error, and empty states. Pulls paid invoice revenue data via useGetRevenueData.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Static panel explaining that role management is disabled and admin access uses a single password.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Renders an admin table for managing shipments for a client, including creation, deletion, form dialogs, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Admin map panel that lazily loads Google Maps and displays shipment markers only when enabled.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches UI crashes and displays a detailed error card with refresh and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message when a user lacks required permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated admin bootstrap card that displays a notice that Internet Identity admin setup is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Admin login form that authenticates using a password and displays errors or loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button for admins that triggers logout and scrolls back to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog with a form for company details; kept for compatibility.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard showing shipments and invoices with logout and WhatsApp support actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays client invoices with status badges, error handling, and actions like download or pay.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Form card for clients to change their temporary password with validation and API mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Tab-based wrapper showing login or signup cards and switching tabs after successful signup.
Client login form supporting password and OTP authentication with validation and API calls.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Displays a client's active and delivered shipments with loading, error, and authentication states.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Signup form for new client accounts with identifier validation, password checks, and API submission.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Context provider managing client session tokens in localStorage and exposing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Hooks to check admin bootstrap status and trigger the initial admin bootstrap via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Implements admin session handling with token storage, validation, and login logic using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSession.ts: Empty placeholder file for client session logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for client signup, login, OTP flows, and related backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles and Tailwind configuration including theme variables and DFC branding colors.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable invoice PDF by opening a styled HTML document in a new window.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty placeholder file for shipment-related storage utilities.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local types for profiles, clients, and re-exports backend types for convenience.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Creates WhatsApp deep links for invoice reminders and customer support messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and renders the app.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps various auth-related error shapes and messages to concise, user‑friendly strings with pattern matching and fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers, returning type, normalized value, and user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/queryErrorMessage.ts: Extracts readable UI-safe messages from React Query errors, delegating auth-related cases to clientAuthErrors and handling common patterns.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls the page to a target element by ID, accounting for a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing, with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, known issues, feature requirements, and pending fixes related to client signup errors.
